regen.new_specification: The system shall save all user-adjusted settings for COs, Mahjong rules, and personalized images for initialization when the game begins.

regen.absent_element: saving and initializing the settings for game start
regen.new_specification: All personalized settings made by the user shall be saved and automatically initialized when a new game begins.

regen.absent_element: saving all configuration settings for initialization
regen.new_specification: The system shall save all user settings, including CO ability levels, Mahjong rule variations, and personalized images, so that they can be applied when a new game is initialized.

label: The MultiMahjongClient will save the user preferences in a file and read them in when the program begins.
absence: action of saving user preferences for initialization when the game begins
